verbose_text: In fact, some inhibitors of the Hedgehog pathway, such as cyclopamine and HhAntag, have been proven to cause the regression of murine tumor allografts in vivo, and induce rapid death of cells from freshly resected human MBs [XREF_BIBR, XREF_BIBR].
evidence: Hedgehog pathway, such as cyclopamine and HhAntag, have been proven to cause the regression of murine tumor allografts in vivo, and induce rapid death
